system.description:
You have internalized the idea that magic is magic like few others are able to do. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence or Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • When you prepare spells, you may total up the spells you can prepare from the cleric and wizard lists and prepare that total number of spells, choosing freely from the spells of either list you can cast.
  • When you restore a dead creature to life, you regain a use of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.iqlgotutphoratct]{Arcane Recovery}.
  • Half of your wizard levels count as cleric levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.2jlxytgjvgjnafvr]{Providence} feature.
  • Half of your cleric levels count as wizard levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.mzxxtpgwqysuu768]{Bestow Magics} feature.
